segments.text: My wife is sick , so I have to cancel a reservation I made .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you'll just give me your name , phone , and date of visit , I can cancel your reservation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm Rudy Randolph at 818-555-1234 , April ninth to the fifteenth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Randolph . Okay , one second , sir , and there you go . Your reservation is now cancelled .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish everything in life was so simple . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not a problem , sir . Please remember us in the future .
segments.speaker: S2
